about_the_game:
Desperate times call for desperate measures. Fresh out of journalism school, your only hope to live in the bustling Capital is a thrilling gig: paparazzi extraordinaire!

Unveil celebrities' hidden truths by day to avoid being fired. By night, the glittering facades of artists, actresses, and heartthrobs crumble, revealing their secret cravings.

Build trust, forge friendships, and even fulfill their deepest desires or ignite a forbidden plastic love - all tools in your arsenal (morals optional).

In Celebrity Hunter, you'll expose the darkest secrets of fascinating people, from model exploitation and the dark side of cinema to mafia underworld and corruption in city hall.

Every decision you make has the power to shape your destiny in this ambitious and ruthless city. Pursue your own desires... at the expense of others? Or sacrifice your own dreams to save your loved ones? The choice is yours!

Celebrity Hunter is an adult visual novel like you've never seen before.

Highlights



The following content is currently available in the original version, and we plan to include it in the PC global version here on Steam with updates on the 1st and 15th of each month:

  • 3,500,000+ characters of dialogue
  • 2,100+ choices (many of them extremely impactful)
  • 3,500+ unique renders (not just small variations of the same scene)
  • Dozens of animations
  • 100+ explicit sex scenes covering a wide range of fetishes
  • 8 main girls and 1 guy (with rich stories and unique personalities)
  • Dozens of supporting or side characters with their own stories
  • Progression without grind mechanics
  • 10+ endings (3 main characters, each with three endings, plus other parallel ones)
  • Various ways to die or be fired (real consequences for your choices)

Real Characters



The girls and guys of CH aren't there just for you to hook up with. They have their own goals. Sometimes these goals may align with what you want, but most of the time you'll be in conflict. You'll have to make tough choices and test the limits of your morals and evaluate your own objectives. Characters planned for the final version include:

  • Priscila - Model and actress suffering in the dark side of fashion and cinema
  • Sayuri - Chinese Olympic athlete involved in a different culture
  • Júlia - Young nymphomaniac university student in a toxic relationship
  • Diana - Casino singer trapped in an inhumane contract
  • Nathan - Foreigner trying to stay in the country by any means necessary
  • Cássia - Magazine editor, manipulative and determined to have power
  • Sofia - Ethical workaholic struggling to impose her way of working
  • Natasha - Mysterious woman whose exact role we're not sure of
  • Nine - Hacker on a revenge mission against the established power in the Capital

Truly Impactful Choices


Choices in CH really make a difference. It's like an "open world" of decisions. You'll notice that each encounter can end in one, two, or even three different ways (plus smaller variations), and all of these variations are considered in the rest of the story. Each main character will have at least three endings, and your choices hold the key to each one! It's practically impossible to have two identical games in Celebrity Hunter given the number of choices you'll have to make.

Brace yourself for tough calls about love, loyalty, and career that will determine your character's fate:

  • Being friends, lovers, or having casual sex with celebrities
  • Balance juicy exposés with keeping your celebrity crushes out of media trouble
  • Discovering secret characters that appear under certain conditions
  • Choosing to have sex or learn more about their lives
  • Aligning with ethical people or those who disregard morality
  • How to progress and end each Date you participate in
  • Completely ignoring certain characters

Story and Dialogues Like You've Never Seen


We truly believe in the strength of our story and dialogues. Completely devoid of narration, CH unfolds dynamically, solely through dialogues and the protagonist's thoughts. You'll notice how subtle our text is, full of nuance and interesting to follow.

The goal of Geiko with Celebrity Hunter is to offer you a real world, with real characters, so you can make real choices in an "almost real" new life, full of emotion and action, mystery and suspense, secrets, revelations and lots of sex!

content_descriptors.notes: In addition to hundreds of explicit sex scenes, Celebrity Hunter explores adult themes such as abuse, depression, crime, corruption, drugs, violence, and other sensitive topics.

name: Celebrity Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The most ambitious indie adult VN with 70+ hours of gameplay! Live your wildest fantasies with 9 main characters (and dozens of others) in 3500+ 4k scenes. Create your cinematic story with 2100+ impactful choices and over 30 endings! After 3 mi downloads in Brazil, CH comes to seduce you!
